Date of Travel: JANUARY 2018
Airline: Norwegian
Livery: Norwegian standard with ‚ÄúChristopher Columbus‚Äù tail
Route: ARN-GOT
Aircraft: Boeing 737-800
Registration: LN-NIH
Flight Number: DY4087
Miles: 244
Airborne time: 0h49m
Notes: None
Cost to book: ¬£51 one way including seat selection 

Thanks for finding my video and pressing play!

In this video I travel on a Swedish domestic flight between Stockholm-Arlanda and Gothenburg-Landvetter. 

I really like Norwegian‚Äôs ethos and product. I‚Äôve flown with them a few times now and the thing that impressed me most is the simplicity of their services. Nothing is difficult to use, they‚Äôre always affordable, and the inflight connectivity is the best I‚Äôve experienced inside Europe. 

This flight was cheaper than the equivalent train journey and, when you factor in getting to and from the airports at either end, around the same time. It also helped that the following day I needed to be at Gothenburg airport very early, to catch the BRA flight featured in this trip report! https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=06ozZHHGLcw

In all, a perfectly simple and good value experience again from Norwegian. The flight was punctual despite some bad weather around Sweden, and the whole experience was efficient and easy. 

If you want to find out more about my future plans and join in conversations I have about travel, follow me on Twitter: @pauls_trips. I‚Äôve started using it properly now and it would be great to see some of you there too.
